info.title: USA Today Movie Reviews
info.description: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

get.summary: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is availabl
get.description: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

parameters.name: actors
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available actors featured in a movie review.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: directors
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available directors featured in a movie review.

parameters.name: movies
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available movie reviews.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: By default, returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.
